message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible product! It's a unique opportunity to own something truly special. I'm willing to sell it to you for $850000. I believe this is a fair price considering its value and rarity.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value you see in the product. However, my budget allows me to pay up to $750000 for the item. I hope we can come to an agreement that works for both of us.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand that you're looking to stay within your budget. However, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $775000. This is a fair compromise considering the value and uniqueness of the product.
